review: I cannot browse internet through  Amazon Fire TV. I believe that this facility is mandatory for the device as it is claimed  as a smart tv device.
author: Arnab Baksi

review: While paused on Netflix, it makes a ringing sound
author: Jack Weinstein

review: An excellent device, which has replaced our Apple TV and Roku 3.  My only suggestion is that it would benefit greatly from a global search function, as on Roku.  Still, it's a great little device and the games are also enjoyable for our kids.
author: Jason Rosenfeld "Scenic Labs Guy"

review: We all love our Amazon Fire TV.  It is very easy to hook it up.  Within 5 minutes we were searching and playing around with the device.  It is extremely easy to use and it is very fast.  So far we have watched Amazon Prime movies, You tube movies, and watched Netflix.  All have worked very well and uploaded extremely fast.
author: piercka1

review: I was persuaded to purchase the Fire TV when I realized I could see all the previous seasons of Downton Abbey for free. I have had Prime for several years and the Fire really enhances the membership. I have the voice recognition remote which was a splurge but makes it all quicker and easier.
author: No Labels
